flawed_nl_solution:
He has 3 hours to read because 8 - 3.5 - 1.5 = <<8-3.5-1.5=3>>3
He has 810 minutes to read because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=810>>810
He can read 8100 words because 810 x 10 = <<810*10=8100>>8100
#### 8100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
